title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: SOL Surges 16% as Index Inches Higher From Friday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Chainlink (LINK) joined Solana (SOL) as a top performer, gaining 4.3%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 4022.91, up 0.3% (+12.57) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

Four of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SOL (+16.0%) and LINK (+4.3%).

Laggards: DOT (-13.3%) and RENDER (-12.9%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is up 0.3% with SOL surging 16% and LINK gaining 4.3%, indicating overall positive market movement despite some laggards.
